description.highlights: Design of bespoke art gallery display with intricate gardens, sculptures, water features, and an international collection.
description.shape: A blend of 3D geometries with traditional Thai craftsmanship.
description.spatial design: The gallery offers an immersive experience with carefully considered zoning, lighting, and seating.
description.material design: Use of all-natural materials to display the collection, which includes the largest Wedgwood collection in Southeast Asia.
description.keywords: Art Collector, Chiang Mai, Thailand, bespoke artworks, natural materials, Wedgwood collection, immersive experience, 3D geometries, Thai craftsmanship, gallery design

facade.highlights: The highlight of this design is the seamless integration of indoor and outdoor elements, creating a tranquil and natural atmosphere.
facade.shape: The architecture utilizes clean lines and rectangular forms, harmonized with organic curves as seen in the seating area and lighting fixtures.
facade.spatial design: The highlight of its shape and form is the fluidity and openness of the space, along with the incorporation of water features and stepped pathways which enhance the feeling of a natural oasis.
facade.material design: The highlight in its spatial and material design includes the use of natural materials such as stone and wood, combined with modern lighting elements and glass to create a contemporary yet warm environment.
facade.keywords: Indoor-outdoor integration, tranquility, clean lines, organic curves, natural materials, contemporary, open space, water features

floorplan.highlights: The design is highlighted by its organic, flowing shapes that resemble a topological map, creating interconnected spaces with a natural rhythm.
floorplan.shape: The form is curvilinear and sinuous, emulating natural organic shapes rather than rigid geometric lines.
floorplan.spatial design: The highlight of its shape and form is the way it creates continuous and fluid spaces that encourage exploration and movement.
floorplan.material design: While the image does not provide specific material details, the design suggests a use of materials that complement the organic aesthetic, possibly with varying textures to enhance the topographical feel.
floorplan.keywords: Organic, Fluidity, Curvilinear, Interconnected, Exploration, Natural rhythm

interior.highlights: The integration of organic elements with modern architectural materials. The large, wicker-like structure that twists and turns above a central green tree creates a naturalistic focal point in an indoor setting.
interior.shape: The form includes curved, organic shapes that mimic natural forms and movements, offset by the straight lines of the steel beams and glass of the ceiling.
interior.spatial design: The highlight of its shape and form is the fluidity and natural appearance of the winding structure, which complements the living tree at its center.
interior.material design: The highlight in its spatial and material design is the use of materials that contrast and balance each other—the organic, wicker-like material of the large structure against the modern, industrial materials used in the ceiling and surrounding glass.
interior.keywords: Organic, Curved, Natural, Modern, Wicker-like, Industrial, Greenery, Fluidity, Contrast, Balance

interior2.highlights: The highlight of this design is the organically shaped wooden ceiling installation that creates a dynamic and flowing canopy above the space.
interior2.shape: The design uses a flowing, curvilinear form that resembles natural shapes and contours.
interior2.spatial design: The highlight of its shape and form is the seamless integration of the ceiling element with the space, creating an uninterrupted visual flow that draws the eye upward and throughout the room.
interior2.material design: The use of warm-toned wood for the ceiling installation provides a naturalistic and inviting atmosphere while complementing the modern and sleek materials used elsewhere, such as the marble counters and metal fixtures.
interior2.keywords: Organic, Flowing, Wood, Warm, Curvilinear, Seamless, Natural, Dynamic, Canopy, Inviting
